entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness then 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening then 60 percent chance of rain showers late this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Risk of freezing rain this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few rain showers beginning in the evening then changing to flurries near midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023
